attributes.action: have a reminder sent to Vehicle owners in advance of their MOT test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An MOT test is a requirement of law.  If a person does not have a valid MOT certificate for their vehicle then they can be given a fixed penalty notice of £60 or worse.
A reminder is sent for Vehicle tax before it becomes due, but nothing is sent for MOTs.
This petition is to ask the Prime Minister to instigate the sending of reminders to vehicle owners before their MOT is due for renewal.
